title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
creator_credit: George Nelson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
title_for_label: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray ‘Tongola’
